MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the LL20 postcode area of Llangollen, affecting properties in the local area. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at  1:48PM. Our engineers have arrived on site and are investigating the cause of the fault.  Our team will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 5PM. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 4:20pm on 20th October 2020
